name: Real Bus Driving Simulator
description:
Are you ready to drive the tourist bus simulator?
This is the best Bus simulation game for all ages including kids. This is not like other driving games. Drive this extreme offroad Coach Bus simulator game and safely transport the passengers. Be careful while driving the big bus because the roads are slippery and extremely dangerous. As a real bus driver your duty is to transport passengers between the bus stops around the city more you transport passenger more you can earn. You will drive the bus with more accuracy and also by following the indicators rules. There are also multiple challenging levels and realistic 3d environment. Download now and enjoy this bus simulator with stunning sound effects and awesome 3d graphics.
